review: loved this movie. it's my favorite. shahid and vidya's jodi was the cutest ever! a good family film. shahid is my crush and i also love vidya. i just loved the way shahid hugged vidya near the end. this movie was a gem. i wish they had done more movies together

watching this movie 11 years later from its release year of 2008. the movie story, concept and the luck factor they have focused on it's amazing and totally ahead of it's time! :-) shahid, om puri, vidya & specially juhi chawla (ultra charming beauty) have done a brilliant job !! :-)

the love story of raj malhotra and priya with a message. worth watching.  creative story writing, superb acting by the cast. even after 11 years of release the story looks like a new release and takes away all stress, tension, and anxiety. thanks for the time
